title: 26 shoes that are bound to help you make a statement this summer
text:
Next 
What makes an It shoe? Perhaps it’s as easy as a reworked classic, a tweak here and there, like Dior’s kitten heel – its logo dressmaker tape straps are sure to set waiting lists soaring. Or it’s an easy to wear pool sliders – this time souped up and decorated with crystals at Lanvin. But make no mistake, it’s those stop-in-the-street, head turning styles like Balenciaga’s sharp booties or Anthony Vaccerello for Saint Laurent’s monogrammed heel courts, that will walk out of stores just as quickly as they came in. The waiting list game will have already begun, but there is still time to stay one step ahead. Here’s Vogue’s guide to this season’s most desired shoes, and when to buy them. 1 /26 110 pump in black, Saint Laurent by Anthony Vaccarello, Rs 63,910 Leather sandals, Marc Jacobs, Rs 35,280 Rocher sandal, Gianvito Rossi, Rs 41,160 Leather sandal, Isabel Marant, Rs 39,900 Leather sandals, Proenza Schouler, Rs 63,840 Zebra-stripe shoes, Sergio Rossi, Rs 52,500 Embellished buckle slides, Roger Vivier, Rs 96,600 Red knife boots in leather, Balenciaga, Rs 62,580 Hobnail ankle boots, Alexander McQueen, Rs 1,04,580 Gold kitten heels, Prada, Rs 56,280 Suede ankle strap shoes, Valentino, Rs 64,680 Embellished slides, Alexander Wang, Rs 51,250 Poker face high boot, Louis Vuitton, Rs 1,42,800 Trainers, Céline, Rs 34,440 Wedges with ankle strap, Bottega Veneta, Rs 54, 600 Dior ribbon-detail kitten heels, Dior, Rs 54,600 Sandals in calfskin leather, Chloé, Rs 49,900 Embroidered sliders, Dolce & Gabbana, Rs 23,500 Multi-coloured platforms, Christian Louboutin, Rs 54,180 Embellished slip-on kitten heels, Giuseppe Zanotti, Rs 52,900 Platform shoes, Gucci, Rs 60,900 Studded platforms, Coach, Rs 63,000 Laced boots, JW Anderson, Price on request Patent shoes, Givenchy, Rs 53,750 Embellished sandals, Manolo Blahnik, Rs 64,270 Embellished slides, Lanvin, Rs 63,450 This article originally appeared on Vogue.co.uk
